name: Lesbian Mothman Hunters
description:
A short visual novel made in around a month for Cryptid Jam.

Guide the skeptical Charlie through a night in her local woods, helping her cute friend Mia search for the infamous Mothman (or, possibly, the less-infamous Owlman. Mia insists that the difference is academic). 

  • Get lost in the woods
  • Choose if Charlie flirtatiously teases her crush or not
  • Change whether this game should even have "Mothman" in the title
  • Wonder why Mia would even think about looking for Owlman here. I mean this is literally just behind her house, someone would have noticed
  • Watch as Charlie holds hands with a girl whilst also being a girl
  • Discover why Mia really came to these woods

This game is intended to be suitable for all audiences, but contains mild threat, anxiety, and also they say "Oh My God" four times. Please leave any glitches or typos that you notice in the comments.

Game created in Ren'py (https://www.renpy.org/)

Designed, Written, and Produced by Zoe Lillith Anghelides (Twitter: @dalekhat, Portfolio: https://zoelillitha.wordpress.com/)

Art and Character Design by Peter Brenn (Instagram: onesp1cyboi)

Background Photography by Sam Angl (Twitter: @samangl_)

Music by Alice Exley (Twitter: @Alice_blackmage)
Soundtrack: https://blackmage.bandcamp.com/album/lesbian-mothman-hunters?fbclid=IwAR0j1U6D8pWA0j8eL3X4kNhMKJdUz6Q_0gCUkhB20PR4KT-Faa8PX_ypB-Q

Assets used under Creative Commons Attribution licence: \"snowy owl.mp3\" by soundmary (modified, https://freesound.org/people/soundmary/sounds/194945/ ), "Heart sound.wav" by DaniraMO5 (modified, https://freesound.org/people/Daniramo5/sounds/469249/ ) Licence available at https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
